TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit LayoutEngine extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供用于实现布局引擎的基类。

span.span: Provides the base class for implementing layout engines.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用类时想要在运行时创建自定义布局行为。Use the class when you want to create custom layout behavior at run time. 派生您自己的类从类并重写方法来定义自定义布局行为。Derive your own class from the class and override the method to define your custom layout behavior. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将类，以实现自定义布局行为。The following code example demonstrates the use of the class to implement custom layout behavior. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.Layout.LayoutEngine#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Layout.LayoutEngine/cpp/DemoFlowLayout.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.Layout.LayoutEngine#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Layout.LayoutEngine/CS/DemoFlowLayout.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.Layout.LayoutEngine#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Layout.LayoutEngine/VB/DemoFlowLayout.vb#1)]

related.span: 如何：实现自定义布局引擎

span.span: How to: Implement a Custom Layout Engine

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

para.span: 布局行为应相同的布局引擎的关联的容器任何的类实例。

span.span: Layout behavior should be the same for any instance of your layout engine's associated container class.

para.span: 出于此原因，请考虑声明布局引擎的构造函数或，和实现将布局引擎作为一个单独的类。

span.span: For this reason, consider declaring your layout engine's constructor or , and implementing your layout engine as a singleton class.

Initializes the layout engine.

remarks.format: ## Remarks （可选） 提供中的初始化逻辑方法。Optionally provide initialization logic in the method.

exception.span: 不是一个 可在其上执行布局的类型。

param.name: container

span.span: The container on which the layout engine will operate.

param.name: layoutEventArgs
param.span: 来自 事件的事件参数。

span.span: An event argument from a event.

summary.span: 请求布局引擎执行布局操作。

span.span: Requests that the layout engine perform a layout operation.

returns.span: 如果 的父容器应重新执行布局，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if layout should be performed again by the parent of ; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要对其执行布局操作的布局引擎时调用此方法`container`参数。This method is called when the layout engine is to perform a layout operation on the `container` parameter. 你可以检查的值， ，并上的属性`layoutEventArgs`来决定是否需要执行布局操作。You can check the value of the , , and properties on `layoutEventArgs` to decide if a layout operation is necessary. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将方法来实现自定义布局行为。The following code example demonstrates the use of the method to implement custom layout behavior. 此代码示例是为提供一个更大示例的一部分类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.Layout.LayoutEngine#4](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Layout.LayoutEngine/cpp/DemoFlowLayout.cpp#4)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.Layout.LayoutEngine#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Layout.LayoutEngine/CS/DemoFlowLayout.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.Layout.LayoutEngine#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Layout.LayoutEngine/VB/DemoFlowLayout.vb#4)]

exception.span: 不是一个 可在其上执行布局的类型。

span.span: is not a type on which can perform layout.

para.span: 重写方法以提供自定义布局行为。

span.span: Override the method to provide your custom layout behavior.

para.span: 布局的内容时参数，请务必检查每个子控件的属性。

span.span: When laying out the contents of the parameter, be sure to check the property of each child control.

para.span: 返回如果布局引擎逻辑将确定由父容器应重新执行布局。

span.span: Return if your layout engine logic determines that layout should be performed again by the parent of the container.

para.span: 例如，这可能会发生布局引擎调整子控件的大小和确定容器，必须增加的大小以适应新布局时。

span.span: This might occur, for example, when the layout engine resizes child controls and determines that the container must be increased in size to accommodate the new layout.

related.span: 如何：实现自定义布局引擎
